ConfigurationType.name: SAESCommon
ConfigurationType.Configuration:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?> <SaesCommonConfiguration xmlns="http://www.smartmatic.com/SaesCommonConfiguration">
<ConfigurationElectionFilesPath> <CodiFilesFolder>firstboot/INSTALLATION_FOLDER/codi_files</CodiFilesFolder> <SAESFolder>SAES</SAESFolder> <ResourcesFolder>StringResources</ResourcesFolder> <ImagesFolder>Images</ImagesFolder> <VotesFolder>Votes</VotesFolder> <DocsFolder>Docs</DocsFolder> <CodiFolder>Codi</CodiFolder> <LogsFolderName>Logs</LogsFolderName> <TransmissionPackageFileName>transmission-package.xml</TransmissionPackageFileName> <TransmissionPackageHashFileName>transmission-package.hash</TransmissionPackageHashFileName> <TransmissionPackageKeyFileName>transmission-package.key</TransmissionPackageKeyFileName> <TransmissionPackageCrtFileName>totKey.crt</TransmissionPackageCrtFileName> <PVFormFileName>pv-report-data.xml</PVFormFileName> <ElectionFileName>election.xml</ElectionFileName> <ElectionStatusFileName>election-status.xml</ElectionStatusFileName> <CardListStatusFileName>card-list-status.xml</CardListStatusFileName> <ElectionResourcesFileName>election-resources.xml</ElectionResourcesFileName> <VotingMachineStatusFileName>voting-device-status.xml</VotingMachineStatusFileName> <VotingDeviceFileName>voting-devices.xml</VotingDeviceFileName> <PollworkersFileName>pollworkers.xml</PollworkersFileName> <StatisticsFileName>statistics.xml</StatisticsFileName> <ActivatedCardStatisticsFileName>activated-card-statistics.xml</ActivatedCardStatisticsFileName> <IncidentReportFileName>technical-troubles.xml</IncidentReportFileName> <ClosingNotesFileName>closing-notes.xml</ClosingNotesFileName> <XMLImageFileName>xml-image.xml</XMLImageFileName> <AssistedActivationFileName>assisted-activations.xml</AssistedActivationFileName> <VotingDisabledFileName>voting-disabled-information.xml</VotingDisabledFileName> <PoliceNotesFileName>police-notes.xml</PoliceNotesFileName> <LanguageFileName>default-languages.xml</LanguageFileName> <VotingCentersFileName>voting-centers.xml</VotingCentersFileName> <ConfigBasePath ProjectName="SAES" VotingExperienceValidationScreensDirectory="VotingExperienceImages" WorkingDirectory="SAESLocal" backupFileName="machineId" languageImageDirectory="images"> <RulesBasePath>vm-rule</RulesBasePath> <LiveFileSystemBasePath>/live/image</LiveFileSystemBasePath> </ConfigBasePath> <SecretKeyFile>secret-key</SecretKeyFile> <UPKeyFile>up-key</UPKeyFile> <MachineKeysFile>machineKeys.p12</MachineKeysFile> <IDCardMembersFileName>id-card-members-data.xml</IDCardMembersFileName> <TransmissionPackageSignatureFileName>transmission-package.sig</TransmissionPackageSignatureFileName> <PVFormSignatureFileName>pv-report.sig</PVFormSignatureFileName> <CACertificateFileName>root-ca.crt</CACertificateFileName> <ItermediateCACertificatesFileName>intermediate-cas.crt</ItermediateCACertificatesFileName> <ItermediateCACertificatesFromPKCS12FileName/> <TrustedCertificatesFileName>trusted-c.crt</TrustedCertificatesFileName> <TrustedCertificatesFromPKCS12FileName/> <PVTemplateFolderName>PVTemplate</PVTemplateFolderName> <PVTemplateFileName>PVTemplate.xslt</PVTemplateFileName> <GeneratedPVReportFileName>pv-report.pdf</GeneratedPVReportFileName> <ElectionResultSignatureFileName>election-returns.sig</ElectionResultSignatureFileName> <VoteStatisticsFileName>vote-statistics.xml</VoteStatisticsFileName> <SignatureResourceFileName>Signature.xml</SignatureResourceFileName> <LogErrorFileName>error-log-file.log</LogErrorFileName> <LogAuditFileName>audit-log-file.log</LogAuditFileName> <X7SSignedKeyCertifiedFileName>signed-key.pem</X7SSignedKeyCertifiedFileName> <X7SSignedCertifiedFileName>signed-cert.pem</X7SSignedCertifiedFileName> <X7SCryptoCertifiedFileName>certToEncrypt.crt</X7SCryptoCertifiedFileName> </ConfigurationElectionFilesPath>
<ConfigurationPrinter> <SkipPrint>false</SkipPrint> <TimeToPrintTicket>500000</TimeToPrintTicket> <UsePresentPaperOnline>false</UsePresentPaperOnline> <DefaultPrinterFontFamily>FreeSans</DefaultPrinterFontFamily> <EndPaddingDirectPrint>3</EndPaddingDirectPrint> <CharsetDirectPrint>0</CharsetDirectPrint> <CharPaddingDirectPrint> </CharPaddingDirectPrint> <CharIndentationDirectPrint> </CharIndentationDirectPrint> <CutType>PARTIALCUT</CutType> <PrinterBackendType>DIRECTPRINTING</PrinterBackendType> <DirectPrintDeleteFiles>false</DirectPrintDeleteFiles> <GeneratePVReportInAllLanguages>true</GeneratePVReportInAllLanguages> <CommandPrintingMode>EMBEDDED_TEXT_CMD</CommandPrintingMode> <StatusMonitorTimeOut>1500</StatusMonitorTimeOut> <StatusMonitorCancel>false</StatusMonitorCancel> <DirectQrUseOptimization>false</DirectQrUseOptimization> <DirectQrCommandHeader><GS>s<10><128></DirectQrCommandHeader> <DirectQrCommandFooter><GS>s<4><18></DirectQrCommandFooter> </ConfigurationPrinter>
<OSConfigurationFiles> <IdHardwareFileFullPath>/live/image/osconf/machine.id</IdHardwareFileFullPath> <MasterDeviceFileFullPath>/tmp/MASTERDEVICE</MasterDeviceFileFullPath> <EventDeviceFileFullPath>/tmp/EVENTDEVICE</EventDeviceFileFullPath> <LineDeviceSeparator> </LineDeviceSeparator> <RemoveEventDeviceFile>false</RemoveEventDeviceFile> <SerialLocationFileFullPath>/tmp/SerialLocation</SerialLocationFileFullPath> <LineSerialLocationSeparator>=</LineSerialLocationSeparator> <ScriptRunSmartCard>smtt-smartcard</ScriptRunSmartCard> <ScriptRunPrintBlank>smtt-printblank</ScriptRunPrintBlank> <ScriptRunDSortVote>smtt-dsort</ScriptRunDSortVote> <SyncFileSignalUSER1>/tmp/SyncUSER1</SyncFileSignalUSER1> <SyncFileSignalUSER2>/tmp/SyncUSER2</SyncFileSignalUSER2> </OSConfigurationFiles>
<MachineSecuritySchema> <SecurityCryptoMode>CBC</SecurityCryptoMode> <SecretKeyEncrypted>true</SecretKeyEncrypted> <ForceReduceElection>false</ForceReduceElection> <VerifySAESFolder>true</VerifySAESFolder> <IsCompressElection>true</IsCompressElection> <IsCompressVotingDevices>false</IsCompressVotingDevices> <ImplementCACertificateFileName>false</ImplementCACertificateFileName> <ImplementItermediateCACertificates>false</ImplementItermediateCACertificates> <ImplementTrustedCertificates>false</ImplementTrustedCertificates> <CertifiedTime>1970-01-01T00:00:00.00Z</CertifiedTime> <ValidateCertifiedTime>NONE</ValidateCertifiedTime> <VerifyExternElements>false</VerifyExternElements> <UseAsimetricKeyForTransmissionPackages>false</UseAsimetricKeyForTransmissionPackages> <InstallationFiles> <EncryptedData>true</EncryptedData> <SignedData>none</SignedData> <ValidateSigned>false</ValidateSigned> <CertifiedFilePath/> <CertifiedType>NONE</CertifiedType> <ValidateCertified>false</ValidateCertified> <ValidateCertifiedConfig>DO_NOT_VALIDATE</ValidateCertifiedConfig> </InstallationFiles> <ExternalFiles> <EncryptedData>true</EncryptedData> <SignedData>none</SignedData> <ValidateSigned>true</ValidateSigned> <CertifiedFilePath/> <CertifiedType>NONE</CertifiedType> <ValidateCertified>false</ValidateCertified> <ValidateCertifiedConfig>DO_NOT_VALIDATE</ValidateCertifiedConfig> </ExternalFiles> <InternalFiles> <EncryptedData>true</EncryptedData> <SignedData>full</SignedData> <ValidateSigned>true</ValidateSigned> <CertifiedFilePath>SAES/machineKeys.p12</CertifiedFilePath> <CertifiedType>PCKS12</CertifiedType> <ValidateCertified>false</ValidateCertified> <ValidateCertifiedConfig>DO_NOT_VALIDATE</ValidateCertifiedConfig> </InternalFiles> <ResourcesFiles> <EncryptedData>true</EncryptedData> <SignedData>none</SignedData> <ValidateSigned>true</ValidateSigned> <CertifiedFilePath/> <CertifiedType>NONE</CertifiedType> <ValidateCertified>false</ValidateCertified> <ValidateCertifiedConfig>DO_NOT_VALIDATE</ValidateCertifiedConfig> </ResourcesFiles> <ExchangeFiles> <EncryptedData>true</EncryptedData> <SignedData>full</SignedData> <ValidateSigned>true</ValidateSigned> <CertifiedFilePath>SAES/machineKeys.p12</CertifiedFilePath> <CertifiedType>PCKS12</CertifiedType> <ValidateCertified>false</ValidateCertified> <ValidateCertifiedConfig>DO_NOT_VALIDATE</ValidateCertifiedConfig> </ExchangeFiles> <UtilFiles> <EncryptedData>false</EncryptedData> <SignedData>full</SignedData> <ValidateSigned>true</ValidateSigned> <CertifiedFilePath>SAES/machineKeys.p12</CertifiedFilePath> <CertifiedType>PCKS12</CertifiedType> <ValidateCertified>false</ValidateCertified> <ValidateCertifiedConfig>DO_NOT_VALIDATE</ValidateCertifiedConfig> </UtilFiles> <PrintedVoteData> <EncryptedData>false</EncryptedData> <SignedData>simple</SignedData> <ValidateSigned>true</ValidateSigned> <CertifiedFilePath>SAES/machineKeys.p12</CertifiedFilePath> <CertifiedType>PCKS12</CertifiedType> <ValidateCertified>false</ValidateCertified> <ValidateCertifiedConfig>DO_NOT_VALIDATE</ValidateCertifiedConfig> </PrintedVoteData> <FileSystemVote> <maxfiles>5</maxfiles> <ImplementTime>CONFIG_TIME</ImplementTime> <FileSystemVoteTime>1970-01-01T00:00:00.00Z</FileSystemVoteTime> <ImplementRandom>true</ImplementRandom> <BackupMarkFile>markFile</BackupMarkFile> </FileSystemVote> <SaltSource> <CalcSalt>true</CalcSalt> <SepChar>|</SepChar> <DefaultSalt>AQIDBAUGBwgJCgsMDQ4PEBESExQ=</DefaultSalt> </SaltSource> <DigestAlg>sha1</DigestAlg> <KeyDerivAlg>hmac</KeyDerivAlg> <Iterations>2048</Iterations> <SignedPVForm>false</SignedPVForm> </MachineSecuritySchema>
<LogConfigurationReader> <LogErrorReader>GLOBAL</LogErrorReader> <LogAuditReader>GLOBAL</LogAuditReader> </LogConfigurationReader>
<BEIDConfiguration> <UseCallbackEvent>false</UseCallbackEvent> </BEIDConfiguration>
<SmartCardConfiguration ConnectedReaderRenewContext="false" ConnectedSmartcardConnectToCheckPresence="false" ConnectedSmartcardPCSCCheckCard="false" UseConnectedSmartcardReader="false"> <AppletAID>F00000006203010C0101</AppletAID> <GlobalPIN>fixed</GlobalPIN> <DataPIN>verification-key</DataPIN> <PlatformMode>GP_211</PlatformMode> <SecureChannelEnabled>true</SecureChannelEnabled> <SecurityKeySetVersion>0</SecurityKeySetVersion> <SecurityKeyIndex>0</SecurityKeyIndex> <SecurityChannelProtocol>SCP02</SecurityChannelProtocol> <SecurityChannelProtocolImpl>SCP02_IMPL_i15</SecurityChannelProtocolImpl> <SecurityLevel>C_DEC_C_MAC</SecurityLevel> <SecurityKeyDerivation>none</SecurityKeyDerivation> <NivelTest>simple-select-applet</NivelTest> <NivelTest>simple-write-read</NivelTest> <SuspendResumeEachVote>false</SuspendResumeEachVote> <SuspendResumeOnErrorCondition>true</SuspendResumeOnErrorCondition> <DelayAfterSuspend>3</DelayAfterSuspend> <DelayAfterOn>2</DelayAfterOn> <ShowMessagePowerCycle>true</ShowMessagePowerCycle> <TimeOutMessagePowerCycle>5</TimeOutMessagePowerCycle> <PowerCycleTries>3</PowerCycleTries> <ForceRestartPCSCD>false</ForceRestartPCSCD> <WaitStopPCSCD>2</WaitStopPCSCD> <WaitStartPCSCD>4</WaitStartPCSCD> <ShowMessageRestartPCSCD>true</ShowMessageRestartPCSCD> <ReadRetry>3</ReadRetry> <FatalErrorCodes>2148532233</FatalErrorCodes> </SmartCardConfiguration>
<PCSCDConfiguration> <StartService>false</StartService> <StopService>false</StopService> </PCSCDConfiguration>
</SaesCommonConfiguration>

ConfigurationType.name: SAESHardware
ConfigurationType.Configuration:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?> <SaesHardwareConfiguration xmlns="http://www.smartmatic.com/SaesHardwareConfiguration">
<SmartcardConfiguration> <SmartCardReaderType>AU9520</SmartCardReaderType> <Extended>false</Extended> </SmartcardConfiguration>
<BarcodeDeviceConfiguration> <PortToLook>ttyUSB0</PortToLook> <PortToLook>ACM0</PortToLook> <ConfigurationCommands CommandBlockName="baseconfiguration"> <Command Command="NLS0001010" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0002000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0006000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="false" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0007000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0200000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0201030" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0203010" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0311000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0314000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0315000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0309000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0302010" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0312030" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0313000=3000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0313010=5000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0313030" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS1216000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="false" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0502020" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0502040" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0502070" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> </ConfigurationCommands> <ConfigurationCommands CommandBlockName="baseconfiguration-hr200"> <Command Command="NLS0001010" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0002000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0006000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0007000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0200000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0201030" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0203010" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0311000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0314000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0315000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0309000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0302000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0312030" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0313000=3000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0313010=5000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0313030" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS1216000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0502020" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0502040" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0502070" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> </ConfigurationCommands> <ConfigurationCommands CommandBlockName="LightsON"> <Command Command="NLS0200000" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="NLS0201030" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> </ConfigurationCommands> <ConfigurationCommands CommandBlockName="LightsOFF"> <Command Command="nls0200020" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> <Command Command="nls0201020" DelayResponse="3000" MandatorySent="true" Retries="2"/> </ConfigurationCommands> <SerialPollingTime>1000</SerialPollingTime> </BarcodeDeviceConfiguration>
</SaesHardwareConfiguration>

ConfigurationType.name: SAESFunctionality
ConfigurationType.Configuration:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?> <SaesFunctionalityConfiguration xmlns="http://www.smartmatic.com/SaesFunctionalityConfiguration">
<VotingExperienceController> <OperationType>PRIORITY_BY_CONTEST_CLASS</OperationType> <ValidateCardDataType>ALL</ValidateCardDataType> <SkipCustomAttributeAutomatic>true</SkipCustomAttributeAutomatic> <NavigateBetweenContest>false</NavigateBetweenContest> </VotingExperienceController>
<Vote FillVote="false"/>
<BlankVote BlankVote="BLANK_VOTE_ENABLED" BlankVoteListContestCode="BLANK_VOTE_CONTEST_GROUP_ONLY"/>
<VMachineInitiator> <MessageRemoveFlashTime>1</MessageRemoveFlashTime> <SuccessMessageTime>500</SuccessMessageTime> <StepTime>200</StepTime> </VMachineInitiator>
<PMachineInitiator> <SuccessMessageTime>2500</SuccessMessageTime> <StepTime>200</StepTime> </PMachineInitiator>
<CardTypeController>smart-card</CardTypeController>
<PVFormTransformation> <type>FOP</type> <FopConfigFile>fop.xconf</FopConfigFile> </PVFormTransformation>
<StructureInstallation>GROUPED</StructureInstallation>
<EnqueueVoteConfiguration CleanVoteRepeated="false"/>
<SystemRole> <role descriptionKey="MenuActivation" key="260780" nameKey="MenuActivation" type="MENU"/> <role descriptionKey="VotingActivation" key="210580" nameKey="VotingActivation" type="VOTING"/> <role descriptionKey="ElectoralActivation" key="abcdef" nameKey="ElectoralActivation" type="ELECTORAL"/> <role descriptionKey="VotingAudioActivation" key="abcde" nameKey="VotingAudioActivation" type="VOTING_AUDIO"/> <role descriptionKey="ClearAlarm" key="00000" nameKey="ClearAlarm" type="CLEAR_ALARM"/> </SystemRole>
<LaunchConfiguration AppType="VotingOnly" PrintInstallationReportPM="true" SkipAutoDiagnostic="false"> <ExecuteInitialCalibrationInAppTypeVotingOnly>false</ExecuteInitialCalibrationInAppTypeVotingOnly> <ExecutePMSetupInAppTypeDiagnostics>false</ExecutePMSetupInAppTypeDiagnostics> <PMSetupCommand>/usr/sbin/pm-setup -s</PMSetupCommand> </LaunchConfiguration>
<AlarmsConfiguration> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="UnableToRead"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>RegularAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="UnableToWrite"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>RegularAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="CryptoError"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="40" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>RegularAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="InvalidContent"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="25" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>RegularAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="CardUsed"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>CriticalAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="CardValidityPeriodExpired"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>CriticalAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="InvalidVotingData"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="11" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>RegularAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="PrinterNeopAfterVote"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>RegularAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="VotePrintingFailure"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="25" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>CriticalAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="PrinterNotReadyForVote"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="40" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>CriticalAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="Timeout"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>RegularAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="Unexpected"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>CriticalAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="CardNotRemovedAfterVoting"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>CriticalAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="CardExtractionCounter"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>RegularAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="PrinterNeopBeforeVote"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>RegularAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="AlarmBoxDisconnected"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>CriticalAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="AlarmBoxConnected"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="1000" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="true" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>CriticalAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> <Alarm TypeOfAlarm="CardReaderUnresponsive"> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="Buzzer"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="RedLed"/> <AlarmCommands IsOff="false" Period="100" TypeOfCommand="GreenLed"/> <AlarmCategory>CriticalAlarm</AlarmCategory> <AlarmBehavior>GoAuthentication</AlarmBehavior> </Alarm> </AlarmsConfiguration>
<OperationConfiguration ConfigurationReset="false" DiagnosesConsideredApproved="false" SimulateVotes="false" StartOpenElection="false"/>
</SaesFunctionalityConfiguration>
